description:
Hello this is Komal from Intellectt we have an opening for a Project Management Supply Chain in Santa Monica CA. Please find the job details and description below and if interested You can reach me at komal@intellectt.com or call me at +1(732)-813-9025.

Job Title: Project Management Supply Chain

Location: Onsite Santa Monica CA

Contract: 12 months

Shift/ Schedule: Monday to Friday 8AM – 5PM

Responsibilities

  • Work with supply chain teams to define, plan, and implement projects to add capabilities, increase efficiency, and improve performance of Kite’s unique cell therapy supply chain
  • Define and establish effective project team structure and resource requirements to successfully achieve project deliverables
  • Develop and maintain integrated project plans to identify/communicate interdependencies as well as critical path activities across work streams
  • Effectively communicate with team members and key stakeholders on project status, risks, and mitigation plans
  • Facilitate project meetings using meeting administration best practices to facilitate cross functional communication
  • Maintain project status and provide routine monthly reporting to Supply Chain and Tech Ops Key team members
  • Responsible for administrative coordination of project related tasks such as maintaining team calendar and scheduling meetings with relevant stakeholders
  • Ensure project team activities and decisions are clearly communicated, documented and archived
  • Utilize change management principles to champion change for successful adoption and post project sustainment of changes introduced

Requirements

  • 0 years’ experience in Supply Chain and/or Project Management with a PhD OR 6+ years’ experience in Supply Chain and/or Project Management with a Master’s degree OR 8+ years’ experience in Supply Chain and/or Project Management with a Bachelor’s degree OR 12+ years’ experience in Supply Chain and/or Project Management with a High School degree

Preferred Qualifications

  • 5+ years’ experience as a skilled practitioner in Organizational or Project Change Management guiding large-scale organizational change initiatives
  • 8+ years of relevant project management experience, preferably in a GxP environment
  • Project Management (PMP) Certification
  • Experience in life sciences industry such as cell/gene therapy, pharmaceutical, biotech, or medical devices is a plus
  • Demonstrated deep understanding of project management processes, procedures and methodology
  • Independently motivated and detail oriented with excellent communication skills
  • Excellent organizational skills and ability to multi-task in a exciting environment
  • Leverage relevant technology such as Smartsheet, MS Project, Visio, PowerPoint and MS Office for efficient project management and implementation
  • Reasonable thinking, deep business acumen, ability to manage complexity, and demonstrated communication skills at all levels in the organization
  • Collaborative individual, able to impact without authority and engage senior leaders and functional partners proactively
  • Comfortable in a exciting, dynamic, and highly fluid company environment with minimal direction
  • Demonstrates respect, focuses on delivering value, and embraces learning and continual improvement
